abstract: The Federal Reserve on Sunday gave its stamp of approval to the takeover of Wachovia by Wells Fargo, which had battled Citigroup for ownership of the wounded bank.
snippet: The Federal Reserve on Sunday gave its stamp of approval to the takeover of Wachovia by Wells Fargo, which had battled Citigroup for ownership of the wounded bank.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve on Sunday gave its stamp of approval to the takeover of Wachovia by Wells Fargo, which had battled Citigroup for ownership of the wounded bank.

abstract: Now that Wells Fargo has fought back Citigroup to win Wachovia, it may take the axe to the investment banking business it’s acquiring, industry observers suggested.
lead_paragraph: Now that Wells Fargo has fought back Citigroup to win Wachovia, it may take the axe to the investment banking business it’s acquiring, industry observers suggested.

headline.main: Wells Fargo May Pare Back Wachovia’s Investment Bank
